<!-- BEGIN_AUTOGEN: do NOT edit in this block -->

**command: `/loadregion`**

**quick ref:**
> /loadregion [x y z] [radius]

**description:**

```
force loading a given region that contains a given point.
/loadregion ~ ~ ~
/loadregion 20000 128 20000 200
```

<!-- END_AUTOGEN-->
加载指定区域，区域参数为世界的坐标参数。
